Source: Cuscuta palaestina ist eine Pflanzenart aus der Gattung Seide in der Familie der Windengewächse.

The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:

(A) Modifiers or Adjectives

In the original German text, Cuscuta palaestina is described as a "Pflanzenart" (plantspecies) within the "Gattung Seide" (genus of silk), which is a subfamily of the "Windengewächse" (Dodder family). The translation replaces this specificity with the very general term "Silk Family", missing most of what the German text said.

Source: Die Liste der Kulturgüter in Roggwil TG enthält alle Objekte in der Gemeinde Roggwil im Kanton Thurgau, die gemäss der Haager Konvention zum Schutz von Kulturgut bei bewaffneten Konflikten, dem Bundesgesetz vom 20.
Translation: The list of cultural assets in Roggwil TG contains all objects in the municipality of Roggwil in the canton of Thurgau, which, in accordance with the Prague Convention for the Protection of Cultural Property in the event of armed conflict, are protected by the Federal Act of 20 May 1898.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer: The error in the translation is pertaining to (E) Dropped Content. The phrase "Haager Konvention zum Schutz von Kulturgut bei bewaffneten Konflikten" is replaced with "the Prague Convention for the Protection of Cultural Property in the event of armed conflict" without any explanation or reference as to why the change occurs. This affects the meaning of the sentence as the original German term "Hague Convention" protects cultural property during armed conflicts, while the adopted term "Prague Convention" targets different types of CULTURAl property.
